com.xorprogramming.game

Interface GameRenderer<T extends GameEngine<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of GameEngine to render

    public interface GameRenderer<T extends GameEngine<?>>
    An interface providing the basic framework for rendering a GameEngine.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts
    See Also:
    GameEngine, GameView

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Disposes graphics objects.
      void initialize(Resources res)
      Initializes the graphic objects need for rendering such as a Bitmap or Paint.
      void render(T engine, Canvas c, int width, int height)
      Performs the rendering of the GameEngine to the give Canvas

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Resources res)
                throws RenderException
        Initializes the graphic objects need for rendering such as a Bitmap or Paint.
        Parameters:
        res - The Resources with which to use for initialization
        Throws:
        RenderException - If an error occurs initializing graphics objects

      • render

        void render(T engine,
          Canvas c,
          int width,
          int height)
            throws RenderException
        Performs the rendering of the GameEngine to the give Canvas
        Parameters:
        engine - The GameEngine to render
        c - The Canvas on which to draw
        width - The width of the GameView
        height - The height of the GameView
        Throws:
        RenderException - If an error occurs rendering

      • dispose

        void dispose()
             throws RenderException
        Disposes graphics objects. Note that a GameRenderer can be initialized after it has been disposed.
        Throws:
        RenderException - If an error occurs disposing graphics
